title: Sketches from Petra, Jordan
description:
Obverse, left: rocks with caves and a pylon. Caption: "Petra".
Reverse: a part of the northwest rock wall with tombs and indistinct designs near the right edge.  The indistinct designs are marked "2" and shown in detail. Inscribed: "silvery / gray". Top right: "Brown / & grey rocks / 2 grey mosses on gold brown color". 
Bottom right: indication of the "North" direction.
name: drawing
